Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Prohibits the diminution of health insurance benefits of public employee retirees
Summary: Prohibits the diminution of health insurance benefits of public employee retirees and their dependents or reducing the employer's contributions for such insurance from May 15, 2019 until May 15, 2020; defines public employers to include the state, municipalities, school districts, and public authorities and commissions.
